mapper.select: select id, name, age, phone, address from t_users where id = #{id}
select id, name, age, phone, address from t_users where id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{id},'%'))
select id, name, age, phone, address from t_users where name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) OR id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{id},'%'))
select id, name, age, phone, address from t_users
mapper.insert: insert into t_users(id, name, age, phone, address) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: update t_users set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
